(DRAFT) - The Naval Surface Warfare Center Dahlgren Division (NSWCDD) has a requirement to provide engineering services to the NSWCDD Maritime Warfare Control Systems Division (H20) for the development of Maritime Command and Control systems, Warfare/Weapons Control systems, and future warfare development. H20 supports programs/systems such as: Littoral Combat Ship (LCS) Mission Package (MP); Surface Launcher System (SLS); Vertical Launching Systems (VLS); AN/SQQ-89, Undersea Warfare (USW)/Anti-Submarine Warfare (ASW) Combat Systems (USWCS/ASWCS); Aegis Weapons and Fire Control; Autonomous and Unmanned Systems; Electromagnetic Maneuver Warfare (EMW); Information Warfare/Big Data; Machine Learning; and Artificial Intelligence (AI).
